history.content:
There are appeal meetings happening throughout the summer but at irregular intervals, depending on how many appeals and exceptions come into the office. Your "deadline" probably depends on how far along you are in your academic career and whether you will get blocked for spring registration if you're not declared pretty soon, or something like that...

Heather

Hi,

I was wondering for the CS Appeal for the decisions that just came out, is there a specific deadline for by when we have to complete the appeal. My internship ends on July 24th and wanted to get a letter of recommendation from my manager at this company as well. Is it ok to wait that late to appeal to the CS decision?

Thanks
history.subject: CS Appeal Deadline?
